headline: Brokers Suggest Investing in Schlumberger (SLB): Read This Before Placing a Bet
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), Schlumberger (SLB) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?
